name: Bendy and the ink machine: downward fall (Reupload)
name_original: Bendy and the ink machine: downward fall (Reupload)
description:
WARNING: This game have swear words, spooky stuff and crap.

Bendy and the Ink Machine: Downward Fall, also known as Downward Fall, was a Bendy and the Ink Machine fan-game developed by Zeronucks and use to be available on Game Jolt with the unknown release date (December 2017). this game got taken down by TheMeatlygames due to copyright issue.

all the assets and textures are not by me , is from the respective owners.
